EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Board- minutes!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi everyone
Here are the minutes from last night:-
Food
A letter has been sent to catering companies in Reading to help us with food.
PJ- will be finalising the budget for food if we have to buy it all
Pi and Harry- will be coordinating food on the day.
Games
Daniel is designing a quiz (please send to me for checking/printing by next Wednesday 13th)
What other games could we do?? We could put conversation starters on the tables- what do people think?
Performers
You CAN ask friends who have not done NCS to perform but I must have their full name and contact information by Wednesday 13th July
Photos/Quotes
Karina and Pi will be collecting these on the day
People attending
- Readibus will have a stall
- Age UK will have a stall
Aaeron and Pi are calling other organisations and will let me know progress by Friday
PJ will be managing volunteers on the day.
Next meeting:-
20th July
Sign up here
Can you please call or text me if you have any worries or ideas!
Thanks everyone!
